title: Prince Charming
description: TAG WAS NO KNIGHT IN SHINING ARMOR. Prince among men? Hardly. But he’s known for his charm.A champion cage fighter and Sergeant at Arms for the Renegade Souls MC.It was a good life.Parties. Wild women. Freedom of a one percenter.And then she rocked up in his world.Marianna wasn’t looking for a relationship,rejecting his friendship at every turn. BIKER PRINCE seeks RUSSIAN GODDESS.He didn’t know her past, but wanted to own her future. Used and abused, her trust levels were rocking at zero. Compulsion.Longing glances.A want that wouldn’t quit. Her past tied to his club’s enemy.Their love came slow.But the desire was stronger than anything felt before.Marianna had one wish, and Tag would do anything to see it come true.Even consorting with a new villain in town. TAG WAS READY TO FIGHT FOR THE BEST PRIZE OF ALL.Author heads up: Get ready to burn slowly while Tag wins his Russian beauty.
author: V. Theia
